componentDescription: A user-interface element for toggling between on/off states.

shape.description: Optional property to determine the shape of the toggle component.

isToggled.description: Optional boolean to define the initial toggle state.

isDisabled.description: Optional boolean to set the toggle component as disabled or not.

children.description: Children property to pass React nodes inside the toggle component.

variant.description: Optional property to style the toggle component with predefined sets of visual types.

colorScheme.description: Optional string to set the color scheme for the toggle component's appearance.

onToggle.description: Optional function that triggers when the toggle state changes, receives the new state as an argument.

[x: string].description: Allows the inclusion of additional properties with string keys.

isHovered.description: Boolean to indicate whether the toggle component is hovered over by the user.

setIsHovered.description: Function to change the hover state of the toggle component.

isToggle.description: Boolean that represents the current state of the toggle.

setIsToggled.description: Function to change the toggled state of the component.
